TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but it's empty

(Your meme is bad and you should feel bad, why an Hitler Scootaloo, why?)

I wish people stop calling Scootaloo a chiken.

granted but "chiken" is not a real word/ instead more people call ember a chicken.

I wish that DE would not become a EA clone

You wish for nothing. Thus everything becomes nothing.

I wish I was more normal.

Granted, you are now just a plain, uninteresting boring person

I wish for lithobraking not to be so lethal

(y does everyone hate chickun? http://derpicdn.net/img/view/2013/10/15/449037__safe_scootaloo_meme_forced+meme_chickun_racist_that%27s+racist.jpeg )

Granted, whatever the hell lithobreaking is is now not lethal, but aerobreaking is really lethal

I wish Chickun wasn't such a forced meme

Granted, it's used as nazism propaganda

I wish annoyingorbit could forget chickun

Granted, but annoyingorbit also loses the rest of his memory.

I wish for a bottle of water.

Granted. You drown in it.

I wish for no more censoring of anything ever.

Granted, rule 34 things on facebook, KSP forum, eBay and in your face

I wish that youtube stop suggesting me ponies video! (even if JanAnimations Studios is a damn good 2d animator and could work for the original show itself)

Edited October 22, 2013 by mrrpamplemousse

granted you get nothing because of the 20% cooler rule

I wish that warframe DE had not because the $hit star trek game DE

That wish was not even close to grammatically correct, and I honestly don't know what that wish means.

I wish I understood that wish.

Granted, you understand it and grant it instead of corrupting it.

I wish that more people knew about the second doctor, he's so funneh

Granted he is now forgotten

I wish i did not have to sleep

Granted, You can't get energy and you live only on coffee ()so you die from a heart attack shortly after)

I wish futurama was not canceled

Granted. It now plays 24/7, 365, and it can never be shut off.

I wish for Minecraft to become real life.

Granted but the Ender dragon comes and destroys you're house

I wish what does the fox say wasn't so popular

Granted, a meme even worst take it's place.

I wish that I was omnicious

Granted, but you lose your power of knowledge after a day, if it doesn't kill you first.

I wish for a potato-powered rocket.

Granted, it has a GLaDOS powered autopilot that want to kill you

I wish to speak spanish

Granted, you can't speak any other language now

I wish, I wish... I wi- *falls on floor in drunkness*

Go home AnoyOrbits, you're drunk

I wish to had a meeting with Lyra Heartstrings

(dammit I want one of them)

Granted, but I get jealous and come along.

I wish I could draw cartoon (Ponehz) properly and get my Original characters out.

Granted you are only allowed to draw r34

I wish my fanfics didn't sound so cheasy.

granted they are the best thing everyone has seen and hasbro make's you there new writer then you die from the stress(linky?)

I wish for stuff

granted

its barbie stuff

I wish for the next persons wish to not be corrupted
